channel.title: A error i can't find out what's the problem
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i587.photobucket.com/albums/ss316/fhillip19281/error.jpg[/img]
WHat is this for?
BufferedWriter bufferedwriter = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter((new StringBuilder()).append("./Characters/").append(player.playerName).append(".txt").toString()));
But i once i open char files i don't see another char files i don't see nothing that saves the char rights in it.. so yea how do i fix it if i can't find the folder that has char rights and stuff in it?
